words/speech/to say/to talk

sentences.chinese: 太危言聳聽了，“她告訴我。

sentences.english: The threat of financial mercantilism can be overstated.
sentences.chinese: 金融重商主義的危害也許有點危言聳聽。
這種危言聳聽的話人們很熟悉了。

sentences.english: Sensation-seeking newspapers tried to cash in on her misery.
sentences.chinese: 專登危言聳聽內容的報紙竭力渲染她的苦境來賣錢。

sentences.english: At first the alarmists prophesied a renewal of the war.
sentences.chinese: 起初，有一些危言聳聽的人預言戰爭會重新再起。

sentences.english: That councillor has cried wolf so many times that nobody now believes him.
sentences.chinese: 那個議員三番兩次危言聳聽，現在誰都不相信他了。

sentences.english: FROM blithe denial to rank alarmism in a matter of days .
sentences.chinese: 從盲目樂觀的拒絕到幾天之內的危言聳聽的排名。

sentences.english: The media will always sensationalize and simplify a story.
sentences.chinese: 媒體息管了危言聳聽和簡化敘事。

sentences.english: Lets hope this scaremongering ceases before being hugely taken out of context.
sentences.chinese: 讓我們期待這之前，危言聳聽巨大斷章取義停止。

sentences.english: But the alarmists have not seen anything yet.
sentences.chinese: 但即使那些危言聳聽者都沒有看到事情的全部。

sentences.english: Fortunately, there are fewer fools around than some of the scaremongers like to think.
sentences.chinese: 幸運的是，喜歡思考的危言聳聽者比傻子還是多些。
